application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details pursuant to the partial discharge of Condition 21 parts (ii) and (iv) (Contaminated Land) and Condition 27 parts (a)(ii) and (b) (Playing Field) attached to planning permission ref. 18948/APP/2020/2551 dated 31-08-2021 (Demolition of existing buildings and construction of a new 8FE school including public library, Sixth form classrooms, new NP/ASD/SRP department, adult education classrooms, outdoor and indoor sport and recreation facilities, and associated landscaping and refuse stores/collection points.)
decision_conditions: Please be advised that this application only permits the partial discharge of Condition 21 parts (ii) and (iv) (Contaminated Land) and Condition 27 parts (a)(ii) and (b) (Playing Field) attached to planning permission ref. 18948/APP/2020/2551, dated 31-08-2021. A separate application would need to be submitted for the approval and discharge and approval of any remaining parts of these conditions.
